price: Onjeni adhabu yenu! Haya ndiyo mliyo kuwa mkiyahimiza.
arabic: ذُوقُواْ فِتۡنَتَكُمۡ هَٰذَا ٱلَّذِي كُنتُم بِهِۦ تَسۡتَعۡجِلُونَ
footnotes: Wataambiwa: Onjeni adhabu yenu hii ambayo duniani mlikuwa mkiihimiza iwe.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: dhūqū fit'natakum hādhā alladhī kuntum bihi tastaʿjilūna
